message: Let's be reasonable. Take it or watch your share shrink!
I think a 60/40 split is fair, considering the inflation. Let's get this done!
Don't be greedy, Bob. My offer is the best you'll get!
Let's be practical. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need a decent share too.  We're both losing money with each round.

Fine, Bob. Let's stop wasting time. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
